Package io.smint.clapi.consumer.integration.core.configuration

Interface ISyncJobDataStorage

All Superinterfaces:
Provider<ISyncJobDataModel>
All Known Implementing Classes:
SyncJobDataMemoryStorage
public interface ISyncJobDataStorage extends Provider<ISyncJobDataModel>
Provides storage layer for some process data that a sync process need to store for recovery.

There is some data that is created in one sync run that must be made available to the next sync run, even if the JVM has been restarted or crashes. Such data is used to speed-up synchronization. The kind of data is defined by ISyncJobDataModel. Eg: ISyncJobDataModel.getContinuationUuid() will help to continue with a failed or otherwise unexpectedly stopped synchronization process, because the assets that have already been synchronized successfully are marked on the Smint.io server side. These can be skipped and only new assets need to be synced. Especially with a vast amount of assets this will improve synchronization speed by magnitudes.

If a next run should start at the beginning - synchronizing all assets from scratch - the only thing to do is, to remove the job data (Continuation UUID). Without this marker, the Smint.io server will start to send all assets, as if none of them has ever been synchronized yet.

Usually the same instance as passed to #storeSyncProcessData(ISyncJobDataModel) will be kept in memory and returns with #getSyncProcessData(). However, it must be persisted to a storage system in order to restore it once the JVM has been stopped and/or restarted.

Beware that multiple synchronization jobs/threads may access the same data. So do not forget to synchronize.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    ISyncJobDataModel
    getSyncProcessData()
    Returns the data that has previously been set by the sync process to be made persistent.
    ISyncJobDataStorage
    storeSyncProcessData(ISyncJobDataModel newProcessData)
    Sets a new set of process data that need to be made persistent and made available to the next run.

    Methods inherited from interface javax.inject.Provider

    get

  • Method Details

    • getSyncProcessData

      ISyncJobDataModel getSyncProcessData()
      Returns the data that has previously been set by the sync process to be made persistent.
      Returns:
      An instance of ISyncJobDataModel that has been previously been passed to storeSyncProcessData(ISyncJobDataModel) or null.

    • storeSyncProcessData

      ISyncJobDataStorage storeSyncProcessData(ISyncJobDataModel newProcessData)
      Sets a new set of process data that need to be made persistent and made available to the next run.
      Parameters:
      newProcessData - new synchronization process data to store for next run or step.
      Returns:
      this and implements Fluent Interface
